dmca.title: [ABUSE] Cease and Desist

-----Original Message-----

Of Policy Enforcement

Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Cease and Desist]
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Cease and Desist]


For your review.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

-------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Cease and Desist
Date: Wed, 31 May 2006 11:32:51 -0700 (PDT)
From: Psychic "Rose(r)" <seepsychicrose@yahoo.com>
To: abuse@theplanet.com

This abuse will stop these website are on your server.  This is a
serious crime and I am not going to put up with this.  Very soon, I will
be filing a federal court complaint and I will add www.planet.com
because you are not enforcing my rights to stop this.

www.faoging.info/
http://www.faoging.info/call-free-one-phone-psychic.php


Call Free One Phone Psychic at FAOGING.INFO ... Remember Go To
www.PsychicRose.org telephone number and print ...
Remember Go To
www.PsychicRose.org telephone number and print ... Go To:
www.PsychicRose.org ... telephone number and print
...www.faoging.info/call-free-one-phone-psychic.php

Psychic Rose(r)

www.TarotCardReadingsByPsychicRose.com

PO BOX 2471
RONKONKOMA, NY 11779
(631) 331-4860

Psychic Rose(r)

www.TarotCardReadingsByPsychicRose.com

PO BOX 2471
RONKONKOMA, NY 11779
(631) 331-4860

Madam or Sir:

It has come to my attention that you are advertising my Trademark name
Psychic Rose and/or Rose
Psychic.    Please be advised that this name is in fact a Trademark name
and by law you are not
permitted to use it without my express written consent.  You have been
using my duly registered mark Psychic Rose and/or Rose Psychic to
advertise your own services on the Internet.

By law you are not permitted to use it without express written consent
from Psychic Rose.
Otherwise, your use of the Trademark name Psychic Rose infringes upon
the federal intellectual property rights of Psychic Rose and your
conduct further violates H.R.S.
Ch. 481A which makes it
unlawful for a person to engage in unfair and deceptive trade practices.

Accordingly, we must hereby demand on behalf of Psychic Rose that you
immediately cease and desist from using the mark Psychic Rose.  Psychic
Rose is considering taking legal proceedings which means you can be
liable for damages and Attorney fees.

Therefore, I request that you Cease and Desist from using my Trademark
name Psychic Rose.   Please
cooperate.
"I represent that the information in this notification is true and
correct and that I am the Trademark owner."

Respectfully,
Psychic Rose(r)
Reg. No. 3,013,312















 
http://www.PsychicRose.org
